author: diguida
body:
The PR includes the follows functionalities:
* A new `DataFormat`, namely `BSTRecord`, describes the Beam Synchronous Timing (BST) data model.
* The TCDS unpacker is now able to retrieve the beam information from TCDS FED raw data, by reading the corresponding address for the BST record. This is done using utility classes in `EventFilter/Utilities`, which have been enhanced for this scope.
* The DQM module `DQMProvInfo` (run by central online DQM) retrieves the BST data format. From this information, the Physics Declared bit is computed, and added into the report summary profile.
* A `MonitorElement` in `DQMEventInfo` is now able to show the HLT path selection in the DQM input source `DQMStreamerReader`.
title: Add a new Data Format for BST record from TCDS raw, and use it to revive beam information, physics declared bit, and HLT event selection for online DQM
